overview: From 2025-04-20 to 2025-04-27, elizaos/eliza had 37 new PRs (24 merged), 7 new issues, and 35 active contributors.

completedItems.title: fix: Prevent repetitive agent replies
completedItems.body: This PR fix the issue where agents were repeatedly sending the same canned response during ongoing conversations in group chat

completedItems.title: fix: openai stt
completedItems.body:
This PR aims to fix a transcription issue in plugin-openai. Externalizing node-fetch was causing failures during transcription requests. This update replaces node-fetch with undici for both FormData and the fetch function.

@0xbbjoker @od

completedItems.title: fix: gui - sync envs state with updated characterValue props
completedItems.body: Previously, envs was initialized only once from characterValue and did not update when characterValue changed. This caused the panel to display stale data unless manually rerendered.

completedItems.title: fix: tts api
completedItems.body: This PR addresses an issue where plugin-openai TTS wasn't working because it returns a Web ReadableStream. The fix properly handles all types of stream responses for TTS APIs

completedItems.title: fix: cli start agent
completedItems.body: Currently, when a file path is provided to start an agent with cli, the agent gets created but doesn't automatically start.
